name: Procrastination (Gregory Avery-Weir)
description:
"Procrastination" is an abstract experimental game, my attempt to communicate purely through game mechanics. It’s my tribute to Rod Humble, if you must.

This is a Flash game I made in 2009. At the time, I thought this game was about procrastination. Now I realize it's about living and working with severe depression, anxiety, untreated trauma, and maybe undiagnosed ADHD. It's not pleasant to play and it wasn't pleasant to make.

If you donate at least $5, you can download full source code and resources for the game. If you're interested in the source for more than one game, check out my Flash Source Code Collection.

Please note: source code is provided without license or support. It might not compile at all, as it may be missing third-party resources.
